yaak.ontology
Class ServiceArenaImpl

java.lang.Object
  yaak.ontology.ServiceArenaImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServiceArena
public class ServiceArenaImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceArena

ServiceArenaImpl provides an arena for coordinating agent services.

Version:
$Id: ServiceArenaImpl.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith
